TEXT.TITLE: NEW YORK LIFE OFFERING A GLOBAL MUTUAL FUND
TEXT.BODY:
<New York Life Insurance Co> said it is offering its first global mutual fund through its wholly-owned subsidiary, MacKay-Shields Financial Corp. The new fund is called the MacKay-Shields Global Fund, the company said. Its portfolio contains foreign and U.S. securities, the company said.
Reuter
